content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to have been able to help you plan your day at Universal Studios Hollywood. It's always exciting to explore a theme park, and with the Express Pass, you'll be able to make the most of your time.

Remember to stay hydrated, wear comfortable shoes, and take breaks when needed. Don't hesitate to ask for help or directions from park staff if you need them. And, of course, have an amazing time enjoying the Wizarding World, thrill rides, and animal stars!

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you have a fantastic day at Universal Studios Hollywood!
